pageContext.claim: “And one of the other things we did in our tax package is … [allowing oil drilling in] perhaps the largest field in the world oil and gas. I got it approved.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump signed legislation allowing drilling in a portion of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge (ANWR). The drillable portions of the area are not the largest in the world (it's a relatively small area), and oil production capacity is less than that of Saudi Arabia, according to congressional Republicans.
